titleStmt.title: Gods rising, his enemies scattering; delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, at their solemne fast, 26. Octob. 1642. But, through many occasions and hinderances, not printed till this 25. of May 1644. By Thomas Case, preacher, at Milk-street, London, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

titleStmt.title: Gods rising, his enemies scattering; delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, at their solemne fast, 26. Octob. 1642. But, through many occasions and hinderances, not printed till this 25. of May 1644. By Thomas Case, preacher, at Milk-street, London, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. R. for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Final two leaves contain list of fast and thanksgiving sermons preached before Parliament, 17 Nov. 1640-24 April 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
